oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Johnnie Wright and Kitty Wells bio - 1983-05-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of a short timeline biography on Johnnie Wright and Kitty Well's respective careers, narrated by an unidentified male speaker on May 27, 1983.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) [Unidentified] talks about Kitty Wells and Johnnie Wright's early lives -- (00:20) [Unidentified] talks about Wells and Wright getting married and becoming singing partners, forming their own group -- (00:40) [Unidentified] Jack Anglin joining the group, as well as Wright's family -- (01:00) [Unidentified] talks about Johnnie & Jack's early recordings -- (01:20) [Unidentified] talks about some of their early hit recordings and some of their accolades -- (02:00) [Unidentified] talks about Kitty Well's early recordings, and moving around record labels -- (02:35) [Unidentified] talks about Kitty Well's awards and accolades, and Fred Rose calling her the queen of country music, and her induction into the Country Music Hall of Fame
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Wells, Kitty;
